attributes.action: I PROPOSE A VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE IN THIS GOVERNMENT
attributes.additional_details: Following the e-petition on a referendum regarding our exit from the EU being usurped by all three party leaders, by imposing their will on members of the house of commons, I propose a vote of no confidence in this government being debated in the house of commons, should it succeed, a general election should be called as soon as possible, thus giving the voters of this country a chance to elect a 'proper' government.
